title: Action Research and Collaborative Learning Projects for Improving Design Education Programs

context.prior_knowledge: No foundational design theory or practical experience
context.additional_context: Most learners are design field job seekers, with the primary goal of improving practical skills using digital tools

learning_goals: Learners can describe the fundamental stages of the design process: problem definition, idea development, implementation, and evaluation
Learners can complete small-scale design projects resembling real industrial settings using digital tools
Learners demonstrate collaborative skills to refine their design solutions through peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
